component.name: Tour Guide
component.description: A step-by-step user guidance component for displaying product features and workflows in a focused overlay interface. Features smart highlighting, step navigation, and interactive tooltips for onboarding and feature introduction.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: Default tour guide variant with step-by-step visual guidance, spotlight effects, and smooth transitions. Effectively guides users through interface features with intuitive navigation controls and professional appearance.
